schema.name: Yellow Pepper With Sunflower Seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the yellow pepper and red onion under cold water.
Dice the yellow pepper into small pieces, ensuring to remove the seeds and inner membrane.
In a pan over medium heat, lightly toast the sunflower seeds for about 3 minutes until they're golden and fragrant.
Add the diced yellow pepper and sliced red onion to the pan, saut√©ing for about 8 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Combine the vegetables and toasted sunflower seeds in a salad bowl, tossing gently to mix.

schema.description: This delightful Yellow Pepper with Sunflower Seeds recipe offers a health-centric twist on traditional flavors, perfectly aligning with a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Ideal for those seeking healthy recipes or reimagined classics with a nutritious boost, it's sure to become a cherished staple in your culinary repertoire.
